description.action: His human form shimmers and transforms into a brown owl with large wings spread wide, the magical transformation causing him to glow briefly.
Watching Evan's transformation with wide eyes and an expression of complete amazement, his mouth slightly open in wonder.
Staring at Evan in astonishment, his face showing shock and fascination at witnessing the magical transformation.
Looking at Evan with wonder and amazement, her small face lit up with excitement at seeing the incredible transformation.
Standing with a confused and startled expression, his arms no longer crossed as he reacts with shock to the unexpected transformation.
Looking bewildered and alarmed, his eye patch visible as he stares in confusion at the child who just transformed into an owl.
